snippet.title: Understanding GPS: Principles and Applications
snippet.description: Moreover, this unique volume helps you determine how technology is affecting the marketplace and where best to invest your company's resources.

snippet.title: GPS Declassified: From Smart Bombs to Smartphones
snippet.description: GPS Declassified examines the development of GPS from its secret, Cold War military roots to its emergence as a worldwide consumer industry.

snippet.title: Celestial Navigation in the GPS Age
snippet.description: This book tells the true story-and the whole story. It conveys celestial navigation concepts clearly and in the shortest possible time.It's tailored for navigation in the GPS age-a time of computers, calculators, and web resources.

snippet.title: GPS for Land Surveyors, Third Edition
snippet.description: In a concise format, this book teaches the basics of GPS technology, common hardware, surveying methods, survey design, planning and observation, and new chapters have been added on RTK and DGPS.

snippet.title: GNSS – Global Navigation Satellite Systems: GPS, GLONASS, ...
snippet.description: This book is a university-level introductory textbook and is intended to serve as a reference for students as well as for professionals and scientists in the fields of geodesy, surveying engineering, navigation, and related disciplines.

snippet.title: GPS For Dummies
snippet.description: This book covers the basics (waypoints, tracks, coordinate systems) but also tells you all about using digital maps and Web-hosted mapping services, so you can venture forth with confidence.

snippet.title: A-GPS: Assisted GPS, GNSS, and SBAS
snippet.description: Offering a detailed look at all the technical aspects and underpinnings of A-GPS, this unique book places emphasis on practical implementation.
